typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as integer,
		FromAccountNumber as integer,
		ToAccountNumber as integer,
		Amount as double,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQL
source(output(
		TransactionID as integer,
		FromAccountNumber as integer,
		ToAccountNumber as integer,
		Amount as float,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CSV
source(output(
		TransactionID as integer,
		FromAccountNumber as integer,
		ToAccountNumber as integer,
		Amount as float,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Excel
SQL, CSV, Excel union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 split(Status == "Success",
	Status == "OnHold",
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(TransactionStatusSuccess, TransactionStatusOnHold, TransactionStatusFailed)
ConditionalSplit1@TransactionStatusSuccess sink(input(
		TransactionID as integer,
		FromAccountNumber as integer,
		ToAccountNumber as integer,
		Amount as double,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@TransactionStatusOnHold sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['OnHoldTransactions.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@TransactionStatusFailed sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['FailedTransactions.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
